alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 08 at 8:48PM AKST until February 09 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility and wind chills to 50 below zero occuring. Visibility will be on half mile or less at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 45 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. The dangerously cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. The worst conditions are near the Bering Strait. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
